titleInfo.title: Using the anisotropic-flow harmonics nu(2) and nu(4) to test dynamical descriptions of ultrarelativistic heavy-ion collisions

mods.abstract: We present various predictions for the anisotropic collective flow of particles in heavy-ion collisions, in particular scaling laws of the second and fourth harmonics nu(2) and nu(4), derived within ideal fluid dynamics. We also discuss qualitatively the deviation from the ideal behaviour expected in an out-of-equilibrium scenario.

titleInfo.title: HIGH ENERGY PHYSICS AND NUCLEAR PHYSICS-CHINESE EDITION
